data.body: Hi, we've found out that in the IPO of **Saraswati Saree Depot Limited**, some allotments were inadvertently displayed as **Not Applied**. Although we've written a lot of logic to avoid incorrect data, it looks like we missed this time. For cases like this, there's an option to reload the allotment which you can find in the three dot menu on the right side of any allotment. Rest assured that we're going to find out what went wrong and correct it so that this does not happen again. Sorry for the inconvenience caused. Thank you.
data.markdown_body: Hi, we've found out that in the IPO of **Saraswati Saree Depot Limited**, some allotments were inadvertently displayed as **Not Applied**. Although we've written a lot of logic to avoid incorrect data, it looks like we missed this time. For cases like this, there's an option to reload the allotment which you can find in the three dot menu on the right side of any allotment. Rest assured that we're going to find out what went wrong and correct it so that this does not happen again. Sorry for the inconvenience caused. Thank you.
